.. _thirdParty_ref:

===================
Third party package
===================

BtK - biomechanical toolkit 
============================

the btk documentation is hosted externaly: `Btk API <http://biomechanical-toolkit.github.io/docs/Wrapping/Python/>`_


Nexus API
=========


There is no official Vicon Nexus API documentation.

Consult this `page <https://docs.vicon.com/display/Nexus215/Python+commands+for+use+with+Nexus>`_


Opensim API
===========


Consult the  `opensim documentation <https://simtk-confluence.stanford.edu>`_
